Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the photo by stating that it is of the Indonesian circuit set to host a 2021 MotoGP race, when in fact it is a photo of the Sepang circuit in Malaysia.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photo is not of the Indonesian circuit but of the Sepang circuit in Malaysia.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough supporting evidence to prove that the photo is indeed of the Indonesian circuit.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photo is of the Indonesian circuit without verifying its authenticity.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that the photo is of a different circuit, the Sepang circuit in Malaysia.
